name: CC MQTT5 Client Filter
desc:
This filter provides MQTT5 transport filtering for the used protocol.

Supported message overriding properties:
    { "mqtt5.topic": "some/topic" } - Override publish topic
    { "mqtt5.qos": 1 } - Override publish QoS
    { "mqtt5.retained": true } - Send retained message
    { "mqtt5.format": 1 } - Set content format
    { "mqtt5.expiry_interval": 10 } - Set message expiry interval
    { "mqtt5.response_topic": "some/topic" } - Set response topic
    { "mqtt5.content_type": "some_content_type" } - Set content type
    { "mqtt5.correlation_data": "0123456789abcdef" } - Set hex bytes of the correlation data
    { "mqtt5.user_props": [{"key": "key1", "value": "value1" }, ...] - Set user properties
    { "mqtt.topic": "some/topic" } - Same as "mqtt5.topic".
    { "mqtt.qos": 1 } - Same as "mqtt5.qos".
    { "mqtt.retained": true } - Same as "mqtt5.retained".
